author: Rockwood, Roy

text: from the paintbrush he had been using. "That's the last stroke. She's
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: finished!"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his chum, Mark Sampson, but in a less confident tone.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "You don't see anything wrong with her, old croaker; do you?" demanded
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack, laughing as usual.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "'The proof of the pudding is in the eating thereof; not in chewing
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the pudding bag string'," quoted Mark, still with a serious countenance.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But like Jack he stood off from the great body of the wonderful airship,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and looked the completed task over with some satisfaction. Having
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: emergency wings, she was also a plane. She was white all over and her
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: name was the _Snowbird_. Jack and Mark had spent most of their time
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: during this vacation from their college in building this flying machine,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: which was veritably an up-to-the-minute aerial vehicle, built for both
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: speed and carrying capacity.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The hangar in which the machine had been built was connected with
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Professor Amos Henderson's laboratory and workshop, hidden away on a
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: lonely point on the seacoast, about ten miles from the town of Easton,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Maine. At this spot had been built many wonderful things--mainly the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: inventions of the boys' friend and protector, Professor Henderson; but
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the _Snowbird_, upon which Jack and Mark now gazed so proudly, was
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: altogether the boys' own work.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The sliding door of the hangar opened just behind the two boys and a
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: black face appeared.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Is eeder ob you boys seen ma Shanghai rooster?" queried the black
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: man, plaintively. "I suah can't fin' him nowhars."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What did you let him out of his coop for?" demanded Mark. "You're
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: always bothering us about that rooster, Washington. He is as elusive
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: as the Fourth Dimension."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I dunno wot dat fourth condension is, Massa Mark; but dat rooster is
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: suah some conclusive. When I lets him out fo' an airin' he hikes right
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: straight fo' some farmer's hen-yard, an' den I haster hunt fo' him."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "When you see him starting on his rambles, Wash, why don't you call
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: him back?" demanded Jack Darrow, chuckling. "If I did, Massa Jack,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: I'spect he wouldn't know I was a-hollerin' fo' him."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "How's that? Doesn't he know his name?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I don't fo' suah know wedder he does or not," returned the darkey,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: scratching his head "Ye see, it's a suah 'nuff longitudinous name, an'
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: I dunno wedder he remembers it all, or not."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "He's got a bad memory; has he?" said Mark, turning to smile at
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Washington White, too, for Professor Henderson's old servant usually
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: afforded the boys much amusement.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Dunno 'bout his memory," grunted Wash; "he's gotter good forgettery,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: suah 'nuff. Leastways, when he starts off on one o' dese
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: perambulationaries ob his, he fergits ter come back."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: longitudinous' name which has been hitched onto that wonderful bird,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: memory--or, perhaps I should say, 'forgettery'."

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Sampson--had been in many perilous situations together. Neither one
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: nor the other was likely to display panic at the present juncture,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: although the flying _Snowbird_ was playing a gigantic game of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "leap-frog" through the air.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: transportation through the air, under the ground, and both on and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: beneath the sea; and in them he and his young comrades had voyaged
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: afar.

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: over the forest.

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: again threatened to shake the 'plane to bits. Mark swayed in his seat,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: clutching first one lever and then another, while Professor Henderson
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: and Jack could only cling with both hands to the guys and stay-wires.

text: The sensation of being so high above the earth, and in imminent danger
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of being dashed headlong to it, gripped Mark Sampson like a giant
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: hand. He felt difficulty in breathing, although it was not the height
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: that gave him that choking sensation. There was a mist before his eyes,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: still the sun was shining brightly. The startling gyrations of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: flying machine for some time shook the lad to the core.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: activity of hand as well as brain. He knew that something had fouled
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and that this accident was the cause of the machine making such
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sickening bounds in the air. She was overbalanced in some way.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He _would_ hang on! His friends depended upon him to control the machine
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and to save them from destruction, and he would not be found wanting.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the rising power that was fouled. He learned this in a moment. He
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sought to move it to and fro in its socket and could not do so. He had
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: overlooked this lever before.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: toward the earth.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: burst through the treetops. She rose again, and using both hands, Mark
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: on, slightly rising as he had pointed her, and Mark dared touch the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: well--remarkably well. I am certainly proud of you. Some day the people
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: professor says we've won out, I don't care what anybody else says."

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the Atlantic in your 'plane," replied the professor. "With proper
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: precautions, of course."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They reached the land and came safely to rest before the hangar without
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: further accident. The professor was delighted with the working of his
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: catapult and at once made ready to call the attention of the Navy
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Department to his improvement in the means of launching an airship
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: from the deck of a vessel. Ere he had written to the Department,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: however, he and his young friends were suddenly made interested in a
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: scheme that was broached by letter to Professor Henderson from a
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: fellow-savant, Dr. Artemus Todd, of the West Baden University.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Professor Henderson and Dr. Todd had often exchanged courtesies; but
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the university doctor was mainly interested in medical subjects, while
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mr. Henderson delved more in the mysteries of astronomy and practical
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: mechanics.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The doctor's letter to Professor Henderson read as follows:
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Dear Professor:
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I am urged to write to you again because of something that has recently
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: come to my knowledge regarding a subject we once discussed. As you
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: know, for some years past I have been investigating not the _cause_
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of aphasia and kindred mental troubles (for we know the condition is
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: brought about by a clot of blood upon the brain), but the means of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: quickly and surely overcoming the condition and bringing the unfortunate
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: victim of this disorder back to his normal state. In our age, when
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: mental and nervous diseases are so rapidly increasing, aphasia victims
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: are becoming more common. Scarcely a hospital in the land that does
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: not have its quota of such patients under treatment--patients who, in
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: many cases, have completely forgotten who and what they are and have
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: assumed a totally different identity from that they began life with."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We know that, in some cases, hypnotism has benefited the aphasia and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: amnesia victim. His condition is not like that of the mentally feeble;
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: he has merely lost his memory of what and who he previously was.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Believing that all disease, of whatsoever nature, can be safely treated
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: only through the blood, _this_ ill to which human flesh is heir
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: particularly must be treated in that way, for we know that a stagnant
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: state of the blood in one spot, at least, is the cause of the patient's
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: malady. Therefore I have been experimenting botanically to discover
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a remedium for the state in question--something that will act swiftly
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: upon the blood, and directly dissipate such a clot as is spoken of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: above."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "My dear Professor! I can announce with joy that this remedium is
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: discovered. I obtained a specimen of a very rare plant brought back
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: from Alaska by a miner who wandered into the fastnesses of the Endicott
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Range, far beyond the usual route of gold miners and in a district
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: which, I understand, is scarcely ever crossed by whites and which is,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: indeed, almost impassable, even in the summer months. With the aid of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: this herb--_Chrysothele-Byzantium_ (it was known to the ancients,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: but very rare)--I have brewed a remedium which, in one case at lest,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: instantly cleared the blood vessels of the patient and brought him
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: back to a knowledge of his real self."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But my supply of the herb is gone. It reached me in its dry state,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: or I should have first tried to propagate it. It seeds but once in
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: seven years and therefore is rare and hard to grow. But I must have
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a supply of the _Chrysothele-Byzantium_ seeds, plants, and all.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: I look to you, my dear Professor Henderson, for help. To you space and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the flight of time are merely words. You can overcome both if you try.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: I need somebody to go to the northern part of Alaska--that is, beyond
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the Endicott Range--to obtain this rare plant for me. You have already
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: flown over the North Pole and a trip which carries one only three or
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: four degrees beyond the Arctic Circle is a mere bagatelle to you."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Yes! it is in you I place my hope, Professor. The hopes of many, many
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: afflicted people may be placed in you, too. I ask you to fly to this
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: distant place and obtain for me the herb that will do humanity such
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: great good. Under another enclosure I send you drawings of the plant
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in its several states and a full and complete description of how it
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was found. You can make no mistake in the _Chrysothele-Byzantium_.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: You know that I am a cripple, or I would offer to join with you in
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: this search. But at least I am prepared to pay for any expense you may
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: be under. Draw upon me for ten thousand dollars to-morrow if you so
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: desire, and more if you need before the start. The Massachusetts Bay
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Trust Company, of Boston, will honor the draft. Make up the expedition
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: as you see fit. Take as many men with you as you think necessary. Make
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: all preparations which seem to you fit and needful. I limit you in
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: nothing--only bring back the herb."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Remember I shall impatiently await your return and look for your
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: success--I expect nothing but unqualified success from your attempt.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: You who have achieved so much in the past surely cannot fail me in
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: this event. I await your agreement to attempt this voyage with
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: confidence. I must have the herb and you are the only person who can
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: obtain it for me."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Your friend and co-worker for the betterment of humanity,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ARTEMUS TODD, M.D., Ph.D."

text: the supper and set the place in order.

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: professor, quietly. "I know that Washington will, and of course Andy
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: will not be left behind."

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: with you, Professor Henderson."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in some uncertainty. "I'se mighty busy right yere jes' now."

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And you'll be busy if we go to Alaska, Wash!" cried Jack. "Hurrah!
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: I am willing to start to-morrow, Professor."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "How will we go, sir? We shall be until fall traveling to the Arctic
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Circle by any usual means."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: much time in this matter. We must take unusual means of getting to the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Endicott Range."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What do you mean?" asked the boys in chorus.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: will take us all quicker than by any other means. Therefore in the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: _Snowbird_ we will make the journey."

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack Darrow and Mark Sampson were glad enough to be of the party aiming
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to reach northern Alaska and the Endicott Range, if Professor Henderson
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: really intended going to find the strange herb for which Dr. Todd was
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: willing to pay so generously.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Of discussion, pro and con, there was much. Indeed, they sat up until
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: after midnight after the reading of Dr. Todd's letter, talking over
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the contemplated journey, and gradually the details of the trip,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: including all preparations for it, were worked out.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack and Mark put into the affair, once they were determined to aid
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the professor, their characteristic energy. Professor Henderson wired
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his brother scientist that he would undertake the journey to Alaska,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and accepted the ten thousand dollars to defray expenses. Andy Sudds
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: made characteristic preparations for hunting the big game of the Alaskan
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: mountains. Washington White built a traveling coop of very light but
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: strong material for his pet Shanghai, and then announced himself as
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ready to depart for the Arctic Circle.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The instructions and map furnished by Dr. Todd, locating the very spot
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: beyond the Endicott Range where the rare herb had been plucked by the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: miner, showed it to be in a very wild region indeed. There was a native
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: settlement named Aleukan within a hundred miles of the valley where
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the herb was supposed to grow in abundance. Professor Henderson
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: determined to lay their course for this place.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But the nearest white man's town was Coldfoot, on the other side of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the mountains. There was a trail, however, passable in summer for a
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dogtrain from Coldfoot to Aleukan; and a dogtrain could likewise pass
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: from the native village to the valley where the miner had found the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: herb.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: These facts the professor and his young associates discovered as soon
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: as Dr. Todd's instructions arrived. They made their plans accordingly.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: By telegraph the professor ordered a trainload of supplies to be started
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: at once from Fort Yukon. First, these supplies would go by boat down
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the Yukon Flats and up the Chandler River, past Chandler and Caro,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: beyond which latter town there was a good road over a small range of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: hills to Coldfoot. This trail was open at all seasons and there was
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a regular system of transportation into Coldfoot.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: From that town dogs and men would be hired to take the supplies on to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Aleukan. These arrangements were made through an express company, and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in three days the professor received word that the supplies were already
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: aboard a small steam vessel which had left the Fort Yukon dock for the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: trip to Caro.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The trip by boat and overland for the supply train would consume about
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a week or two, providing nothing untoward happened to delay it. And
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the season was favorable to a quick journey.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But the professor and his young comrades figured that the _Snowbird_,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: following the shortest air-line to the far side of the Endicott Range,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: could make the trip in much shorter time. The distance "as the crow
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: flies" was from 3,700 to 3,800 miles from their point of departure.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Under favorable conditions the great flying machine should travel ninety
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: miles an hour on the average. Unless there was a breakdown, or they ran
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: into a heavy storm, which would necessitate their descending to the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: earth, they could count upon the _Snowbird_ being in the vicinity of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Aleukan within three or four days' time at the longest.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: In the flying machine itself they could carry a supply of concentrated
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: foods, medicines, necessities of many kinds, and their arms. It was
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: probable that meat could be had for the killing in the valley to which
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they were bound, and the Indians at Aleukan could be hired to supply
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: necessary food for a time. But the professor did not propose to take
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his friends into the wilderness without completely warding off disaster.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Considerable space in the _Snowbird_ was occupied by Professor
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Henderson's scientific instruments. He was amply supplied with powerful
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: field glasses, a wonderful telescope, partly of his own invention;
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: instruments for the measuring of mountains heights, the recording of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: seismic disturbances, and many other scientific paraphernalia of which
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack and Mark did not know even the uses.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The boys were as well supplied with firearms as Andy Sudds himself.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They knew that they would probably see and be obliged to kill dangerous
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: beasts; and although the several tribes of Indians inhabiting Alaska
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: are all supposed to be semi-civilized and at peace with the whites,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they had had experience enough in wild countries before to warn them
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: that the temper of aboriginal man is never to be trusted too far.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Their own readiness for departure in the _Snowbird_ had been gauged by
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the telegraph dispatches from Fort Yukon. When the final message came
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: that the boat bearing the supplies had started, Professor Henderson
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: asked: "And now, boys, when can we leave by the air route?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack and Mark glanced at each other and nodded. Jack said:
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "All you have to do, Professor, is to put your bag aboard the ship and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: step in. We are ready to start the _Snowbird_ at any moment. Andy
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: has his guns aboard, and plenty of ammunition. Mark and I are all
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ready. At your word we will leave."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It is already dark," said the professor, slowly. "Shall we wait until
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: morning?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "The moon will be up in an hour--and it is almost at its full," Mark
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: said, quickly. "The quicker we are off the better, it seems to me."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Very well," agreed Professor Henderson. "If you boys say the word, we
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: will start. Is Andy here?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "He is already aboard--asleep in his bunk," said Jack, "with his best
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: rifle cuddled in the hollow of his arm. He does not propose to be left
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: behind," and the young fellow chuckled.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And where is Washington White?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "He's done yere," answered the darkey for himself, and he appeared
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: bearing the traveling coop of Christopher Columbus And-so-forth in his
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: arms.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Here, Wash!" ejaculated Jack. "Surely you are not going to clutter
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: up the flying machine with that thing?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "An' why fo' not?" sputtered the darkey. "Whatebber has Buttsy done
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ter yo', Massa Jack, dat yo' should be obfendicated at his 'pearance
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in de present state ob de obsequies?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Then the rooster accompanies the expedition," chuckled Jack. "Only
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: remember, if we have to throw out anything to lighten ship, Buttsy
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: goes first--even before we are obliged to dispense with _your_ services,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Wash!"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: will now disturb de continuity ob de ebenin's enj'yment. Forward,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: march, is our motter!"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and Buttsy in his arms.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: with him. He followed the negro aboard. The _Snowbird_ was already
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: outside the hangar and on its wheels, ready for the start. This time
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they dispensed with the professor's catapult, for it would be necessary

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: for sure."

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in your power without knowing. We are amply armed."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of his duty," cried the voice from below, and now the strange airship
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was much nearer to them. "Who do you claim to be?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: reply. "And she is bound for Alaska."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: so. But I have my suspicions. I am Ford, special agent of the Department
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of Justice. Stand by. Now I am coming aboard."

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: great deal smaller and apparently without half the power possessed by
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the one built by Jack and Mark.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: immediately poised over them. In this attitude Ford, as he called
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: himself, had the occupants of the _Snowbird_ completely at his
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: mercy. A bomb dropped upon the huge flying machine would have blown
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: her to pieces. Or, with a gun, he could have picked off one after
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: another of the five people below.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the framework of the airship above their heads. A light rope ladder
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: stood in their midst.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He was a small, gray man--gray suit, gray hair and close-cropped
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: mustache, and gray face, colorless and deeply lined. His age would be
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: hard to judge.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "The _Snowbird_; eh?" he observed, looking sharply from one to the other
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of the five passengers of the huge flying machine. "_You_ are Amos
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Henderson, sir?" he pursued, nodding to the professor. "I believe I have
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: heard your name before. Professor Henderson, whose scientific
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: discoveries have made us all marvel of late?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I am Professor Henderson," said the old gentleman, quietly. "And I
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: can vouch for my companions. These boys, my adopted sons, have built
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: this flying machine, and we are bound for Alaska."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Indeed! Then I fear I have caused you some slight trouble, not to say
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: delay," said Mr. Ford. "We revenue agents are extremely anxious to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: overhaul and interview all aviators along the border. You understand?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I believe that you have cause to suspect certain flying machines
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: operating between the Canadian towns and Maine settlements," admitted
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Professor Henderson. "Quite right. And if our suspicions are based on
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: fact, innocent flying men like yourselves may well beware of the fellows
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: we are after. To be frank with you," pursued Mr. Ford, "a band of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: desperate smugglers are operating by aid of one or more aeroplanes.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: And piracy in the air may soon became as frequent--and as grave a peril
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to innocent aviators--as was ever piracy on the Spanish Main."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It seems impossible!" said the professor. "Who are these desperate
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: criminals?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "A man named Bainbridge is at their head. He was originally a diamond
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dealer and finally was caught smuggling gems into the port of New York.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He had to pay a huge fine and served a term at Atlanta for that crime
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and since then has sworn to be revenged upon the Government that
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: punished him.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We learned of late that he was operating on the Mexican
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: border--bringing into the States diamonds that had paid no duty--by
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: aid of a flying machine. But the uprising in Chihuahua and along the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: border made his work exceedingly dangerous, and he was driven away
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: from that part of the country.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Now we believe he has joined forces hereabout with ancient enemies
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of the Federal officers. At least, there is a strange aeroplane reported
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: Andy.

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: the direction the wounded _Snowbird_ had been blown.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: different from the savages of the western territories of the United
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: men.

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: from their comrades in the flying machine.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: trees. Somehow the _Snowbird_ had fluttered away through these forest
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: monarchs and was now out of sight.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: crash of heavy footsteps and a big man suddenly came panting up the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: slope. Cold as it was, his shirt was open at the neck, he was
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: from his bed. In his right hand he carried a battered "fish-horn," and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: lips, blowing a blast that made his eyes bulge and his cheeks turn
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: purple.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: be you callin' the cows?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: seemed to be a misfit for his huge body. "I am sure I'm glad to meet
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: you. You must have just arrived," and he squinted at the strangely
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: clad hunter and his boy companion, for Mark wore a helmet with ear-tabs.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We just landed, that's sure," admitted Andy. "From an airship, I
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: fancy," exclaimed the other. "That is what is the matter with my Aleuts,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: then. They never have seen such a thing as an airship, I'll be bound.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: with the flying machine, and the Indians have been shooting at them."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: another mighty blast.

text: "I have had this bunch of Aleuts six months," he explained, when he
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: got his breath again. "They are good workers, but as superstitious as
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: somewhere in action--we had a storm of ashes a week ago. And night
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: before last there was a positive earth-shock."

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: blunt way. "What are you doing up here in this heaven-forsaken country?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: repeated Andy and Mark together.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: that they know we are friends."

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: both eyes on the red men. The latter, however, kept to themselves and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Professor!"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: fear of what they considered supernatural phenomena. Jack Darrow and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in the scientific side of the happening. He clambered to his feet the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: moment he could stand, and observed:
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I should say it was pronounced!" grunted Phineas Roebach. Being a fat
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: man, he had fallen heavily. He was now rubbing himself tenderly where
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: he had been bruised upon the hard ground. "This shock beats the one
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: we had the other day."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Not a shock, my dear sir," said Professor Henderson, quickly. "An
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: earthquake is not, strictly speaking, a shock at all. Within the past
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: twenty years science has learned to measure and to study earthquakes.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: If we have learned nothing else, we have learned that an earthquake
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: is _not_ a shock."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It tumbled us about a whole lot, then, Professor," said Jack Darrow.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What would you call it, if not a shock?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to the cabin to complete their meal. Roebach had said something soothing
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to his Indians, but they, like Washington White, preferred remaining
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in the open. Wash sat down beside the cage of his pet rooster, and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: declared to the boys when they urged him to come in again:
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "No, sah! I ain't hongry, nohow. An' w'edder de professor am right dat
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dese yer earthquakes ain't shockin', I kin tell yo' right now dat it
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: shocked _me_! Nor I ain't gwine ter gib it no secon' chance ter tumble
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dat ruff down on ma haid--no, sah!"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Once more at the breakfast table, with the affrighted Indian squaw
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: waiting upon them, the professor took up the topic of earthquakes
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: again, in answer to Jack's observation.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "From the time of the ancients to the middle of the last century the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: phenomena of earthquakes were observed and described upon countless
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: occasions," he said. "Yet even Humboldt's 'Cosmos', published as late
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: as 1844, which summarized the then existing knowledge on the subject,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: did not suggest that earthquakes should be studied like other mechanical
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: motions.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "The effects of the great Neapolitan earthquake of 1857 were so studied
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: by Mr. Robert Mallet," continued the professor. "He disabused his mind
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of all superstition, threw away all the past mysteries, and attacked
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the problem from its mechanical side only. He believed that an
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: earthquake was a series of shocks, or blows; but what he learned led
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: other and later students to the discovery that an earthquake is not
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: made up of blows at all."

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: on my feet; but what was it but a shock that threw me down? Tell me

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: that, sir!"

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: quicker take you off your feet--a blow from, say, Jack's fist, or your
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: affords you so insecure a footing, is likely to throw you easier than
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: a pretty solid blow; eh?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "True enough," admitted the oil hunter, smiling at Jack. "Although
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Darrow looks to be a pretty husky youngster." "My point is this,"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pursued the professor. "An earthquake is a continuous series of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: intricate twistings and oscillations in all possible directions, up
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
