title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: very foundations of the ground we walk on--caused our recent overthrow,"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: concluded Mr. Henderson.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: seriously, "when I shipped for this voyage. I reckoned volcanoes blowed

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: things. Jack and Mark rolled upon the ground in the grove of huge
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: flight.

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: phenomenon.

text: His cabin was by this time riddled by the flying stones and everything
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in and about it was plastered with mud. It would have been foolhardy
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: indeed to attempt to get at the provisions.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "You see," Mark said, "we are forced to get away in the _Snowbird_
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: at once, or to escape to some town where we can get food. There isn't
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: much left of our stores on the flying machine." "And what will Mr.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Roebach do about his dogs? They must be fed," said Jack.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "He'll have to abandon them if he goes with us on the _Snowbird_,"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: returned his chum.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: It was now the long twilight of the Arctic evening. None of the party
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had eaten since breakfast and they felt the need of sustenance. If
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: nothing else, this need of food would have hurried the party on to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: their destination farther up the mountainside.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: As they advanced the roaring of the mud geyser diminished. The professor
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: continued to be much interested in the condition of Nature about them
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: as they climbed the hill. The uprooted trees, and the huge trunks
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: broken off by the final upheaval of the earth, made the old gentleman
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: look very serious indeed.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "There has been a mighty change in the face of Nature," he said
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: thoughtfully. "You boys were saved from death by a miracle, I have no
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: doubt."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We were all knocked senseless for a time," Mark told him.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Indeed? And so were we at the camp. All of us lost consciousness.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Dear, dear! what happened during those minutes that we were all
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: unconscious? Something of the greatest importance--some great change
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: took place that now we can scarcely understand." "And what do you make
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of that over yonder?" queried Jack, suddenly pointing toward the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: northern horizon.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: A deepening glow had appeared in that direction. Rapidly it increased
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: until there appeared above the horizon the edge of a huge disk. Its
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: light was mellow like the moon's; but whoever heard of the moon rising
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in the North?
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What can that possibly be, Professor?" cried Mark as they all gazed
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in wonder at the rapidly increasing body rising into complete view.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Professor Henderson shook his head slowly. For once he was surely at
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a loss to explain a scientific phenomenon. The huge globe, evidently
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: reflecting palely the sun's light, mounted upward more rapidly than
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the moon ever crossed the heavens.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "All nature has gone mad!" gasped Professor Henderson at length. "Have
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: we discovered a new celestial body? I never heard of such a thing--so
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: near to us, too! Come, hurry on, boys. Let me get and mount the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: telescope. This new mystery must be solved."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: CHAPTER XIV
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: ON THE WING AGAIN
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: There was no member of the party who was not amazed and disturbed by
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the strange happenings of the last few hours. The earthquake and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: volcanic disturbances, followed by the outburst of the geyser, and now
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: capped by the appearance of a new and wondrous planet on the northern
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: horizon, were happenings calculated to make more than Washington White
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: shake with terror.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: What Professor Amos Henderson really thought about this new celestial
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: body it would be hard to tell. While the others chattered in their
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: amazement--after his first statement--he remained strangely quiet.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But the moment the party reached the spot where the flying machine
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: rested he went at once to the locker where he had stowed the very
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: powerful telescope that he had insisted upon bringing with them from
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: home. With Washington's help he was an hour in setting up the telescope
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and properly adjusting it, while the boys and Andy worked steadily
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: upon the repairing of the flying machine. Roebach had loosed his dogs
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: again and threw them the last bits of fish he had for them, and they
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: were fighting over the putrid flesh at one side. The oil man watched
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the repairs with interest. He had agreed to travel as far as Aleukan
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: with the party and there hire fresh Indians and sleds, hoping to find
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: these dogs on his return. He had to have assistants and provisions
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: before he could go on with his work for the Universal Oil Company.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Merely that yonder oil-shoot turned into a mud-bath doesn't feaze
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: him," chuckled Jack to Mark. "Earthquakes and volcanoes don't seem to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: bother that chap any more than they do the professor."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Just watch him now," suggested Mark, suddenly.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Watch who--Roebach?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "The professor," explained Mark.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The old gentleman was certainly deeply interested at that moment in
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his study of the great pale globe that was rising toward the zenith
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: so much more quickly than any moon that the boys had previously seen.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The professor was crouched at the mirror of the telescope gazing into
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: it through the powerful lens. Suddenly he threw up his hands and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: staggered back from the instrument, turning a pallid face upon his
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: companions. "What done happened yo', Perfesser?" cried Washington
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: White. "What done skeer yo' now? Dis suah am de startlin'est place dat
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: we ebber got into. Gollyation! Ain't dat moon risin', dough?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It is no moon!" declared the professor.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "A most mysterious thing," Mark said. "Is it some great planet out of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: its orbit, sir?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It is a planet--of course it is a planet," admitted the professor,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: going back to his telescope with eagerness.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And how light it is getting--almost like day," said Jack. "No moonlight
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was ever like this."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Why, we're not as far away from that planet as the moon is from the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: earth," said Mark. "Suppose it bumps us?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "All the more reason for our getting the _Snowbird_ into flying
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: shape," responded Jack. "Maybe we'll be able to escape the bump!"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "You can laugh," grumbled Mark. "But I don't like the look of that
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: thing."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Evidently the professor does not like it, either," agreed Jack. "See
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: him now."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Professor Henderson was gazing first into the telescope and then drawing
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: upon a paper before him. For several minutes he was thus engaged.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Finally he beckoned the boys to him.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What do your eyes tell you that looks like?" he demanded of Jack and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mark, pointing to the outline he had drawn upon the paper.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The boys gazed on his drawing in surprise. It was Jack who exclaimed:
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Why, Professor, that looks a whole lot like an outline map of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Hudson Bay Territory, Canada, and Newfoundland. There's the mouth of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the St. Lawrence, sure! What are you doing?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I have been drawing," said the gentleman, solemnly, "an outline of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: what I see upon that luminous body floating there in space," and he
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pointed a trembling finger at the strange planet.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Impossible!" cried Mark.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I do not think I am losing my mind," said the professor, testily. "It
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: remains, however, that the outline of certain bodies of water and of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: land upon that luminous globe seem to be the exact counterpart of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: land-bodies and water-bodies on the Earth."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But what does it mean?" questioned Jack.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "If I knew that," grumbled the professor, returning to his instrument,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I should feel better satisfied."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: That some strange--some really wonderful--change had taken place in
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: their physical surroundings, too, there could be no doubt. But what
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: it was the boys could not imagine. Of one thing they were sure, however:
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The law of gravitation had been partly overcome. And a second fact was
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: discernible: There was a surprising rarity to the air they breathed,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and had been since the fall of volcanic ashes had ceased.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: In lifting the heavier tools they handled it was noticeable that they
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: seemed lighter. And Andy Sudds surprised them all, when it became
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: necessary to roll a log out of the way of the flying machine, by seizing
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the heavy timber and lifting it with the ease with which one might
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: lift a small sapling.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We've all become strong men--professional strong men," gasped Jack.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Wash is the champion jumper and Andy beats old Samson, I declare!
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: What do you make of it, Mark?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "If the professor cannot explain it, don't expect me to do so," returned
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his chum.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It am de seriousest question dat has ebber come befo' us," declared
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Washington, looking wondrous wise. "Disher jumpin' has always been in
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ma fambly, howebber. We had some great jumpers down Souf befo' de War."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The boys hurried to finish the repairs. It was some time after midnight

text: when they pronounced the _Snowbird_ again ready for flight.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: however; and then he insisted upon setting it up on the deck of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: flying machine. He would not discuss the situation at all; but his
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: serious visage and his anxious manner betrayed to them all that he
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was disturbed indeed by the strange, pale planet he had so closely
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: examined.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mr. Roebach turned loose his dogs again and climbed gingerly aboard
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the flying machine.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: somewhat more afraid of a flying machine than I am of an earthquake."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: on a kite than go through what we did yesterday."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: amidships as he had before.

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: frame. He touched the lever by which the propellers were started. With a
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: whir and a bound the flying machine left the earth.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Never had it sprung into the air so quickly before. It shot up at a
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sharp incline and was over the tree-tops in a breath. The indicator
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: registered eighty miles an hour before the plateau was behind them.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: gasped for breath.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Faster than when shot out of Professor Henderson's catapult the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: but just as Mark Sampson had lost his head for a few minutes on the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: occasion when the _Snowbird_ was tried out, so Jack was flustered now.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The flying machine shot up at such a tangent, and so swiftly, that he
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was both amazed and frightened. The speed indicator showed a terrific
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pace within a few seconds, and when Jack first tried to reduce the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: speed he learned that the mechanism acted in a manner entirely different
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: than ever before.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The motor made more revolutions a minute than she was supposed to make
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: when pressed to the very highest speed. When he had raised the bow of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the flying machine at the start she had shot up almost perpendicularly
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: into the air. He was afraid she was going to turn a back somersault.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: As he depressed the planes he found that it took much more depression
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to bring the _Snowbird_ down to even keel. And the rapidity with
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: which they left the ground and soared upward was in itself enough to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: shake Jack's coolness. Suddenly (being furnished with the professor's
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: patented ear-tabs) he heard that gentleman calling to him from below:
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Get back to the five-hundred-foot level--quick!"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: what these words meant, and he knew enough to obey without question.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He brought the _Snowbird_ down the air-ways on a long slant and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: at a swift pace. He realized that, as they descended, he was able to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: breathe more easily and his head stopped ringing. For some moments he
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had felt like an intoxicated person in the vastly rarified plane of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the upper ether.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The professor staggered to the young operator's side.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Danger! Danger above, boy!" he gasped. "We cannot cross these mountains
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: while--while the air is so thin."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But we need not cross them to reach Aleukan?" suggested Jack, speaking
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: with some difficulty himself. There was a pain in the region of his
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: lungs and he saw that Professor Henderson was very pale.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: hundred feet. Be careful!"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to fairly leap up to meet them.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: doesn't work at all like she used to."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Less attraction," declared the scientist.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: its power over us--and over the flying machine?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Henderson. "The power of attraction is lessened mightily."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: by shouting:
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: quickly, training his glasses on the white streak that appeared on the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ground ahead.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Phineas Roebach struggled forward to the operator's bench. He gasped:
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "This is worse than I ever thought flying could be. Do you have to go
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: so fast? I cannot get my breath. Hullo! That's the glacier ahead. The
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dog trail to Aleukan follows the ice for more than fifty miles."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "A glacier it is," agreed Professor Henderson. "It seems pretty smooth,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack. You can descend still farther."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: That they were all suffering from the rarity of the atmosphere was
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: plain. It seemed as though the envelope of breathable air surrounding
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the earth had suddenly become vastly rarified. If the atmosphere had
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: been so changed all over the globe it would be a catastrophe
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: unspeakable.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We certainly _can't_ cross these mountains--nor the Rockies," groaned
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack. "How are we ever going to get home again?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "If the air remains as it is now?" asked Mark. "You're right! We're
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: imprisoned in this part of Alaska just as fast as though we were caged
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: behind iron bars."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What will we do, Professor?" begged Mark.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: get to Aleukan and see if our provisions have been brought over from
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Coldfoot."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I'll bet they haven't been brought across the range," said the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pessimistic Mark. "If the air everywhere is so rarified the men would
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: die crossing the mountains." "Think of the people living on Mt.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: be snuffed out like candles. It is an awful thought."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the professor, seriously. "Have a care, Jack! Don't dip like that. We
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: do not want to descend here."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the levers so much more quickly than before. The air pressure on the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: traveled scarcely forty miles an hour.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: (it was quite four miles broad) sharp cliffs arose, guarding the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: glacier. These cliffs ranged from two hundred to a thousand feet high.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: cracked expanse of whitish-green ice for some minutes.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: began to crow vociferously.

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of ice. At first view it was quite certain that she could not be
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: before."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: right conclusion.

text: the old world shining there in the sky?"

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: solemnity. "I suspected it when we first felt the lightness of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: atmosphere. I was convinced when I found the ether envelope of this
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: nonsense!"

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: on which they were imprisoned was floating miles above the globe, in
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: Andy.

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: never thought of doubting either the aged scientist's honesty or his
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: learning.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "If the attraction of this fragment holds good here, it will hold good
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: all over its surface," proclaimed the professor. "We have no means yet
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of weighing this torn-away world we are on--this new planet. But it
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: must be of considerable size. Otherwise it would not hang here in space
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: as it does."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And without movement?" cried Jack.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I believe it is circling the earth as the earth circles the sun. We
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: are practically on a second moon--only the fires in the heart of our
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: young planet are not dead."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I should say they were not dead, if that geyser Mr. Roebach opened up
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: is any sign of life," remarked Mark.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "You are quite right, my boy," said the professor, cheerfully. "The
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: volcanic disturbance brought about great earthquakes. These, however,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: were merely warning symptoms. We did not know it, however. Finally the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: great mass of gas formed beneath the earth's crust somewhere about the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Alaskan coast of the Arctic Ocean, we will say, exploded and forced
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: an enormous portion of the crust into the air.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "No wonder we lost consciousness," he continued, with enthusiasm. "We
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: were probably traveling faster than human beings ever traveled before.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The entire nature of the portion of the earth we stood upon was
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: changing. Our atmosphere was changing. We were shot into the sky and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in a flash were beyond the common influence of what we call the law
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of gravitation."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But what a hole we must have left in that part of the world!" gasped
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack. "Think of it! The seas must have run right into the chasm and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: made the bottoms of the old seas dry land."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Not at all! Not at all!" returned the professor. "Think what a mighty
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: globe the earth is. Remember that there are valleys miles
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: deep--mountains miles high! There are holes in the ocean which have
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: remained unfathomed to this day! The surface of the earth is very,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: very rough. What keeps the oceans from overflowing the land and filling
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: all those sinks and valleys that are deeper than the ocean bed? Merely
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the power of attraction which the earth exercises.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Suppose explorers hurry to the scene of the great earthquake--to the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: edge of the vast crater which the blowing-out of this portion of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: earth has left. What will they find--a hole filled with the waters of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the Arctic Ocean?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And why not?" demanded Jack, stoutly.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Because the evidence of our own eyes assures us that such is not the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: case," declared the professor, pointing again to the rolling planet
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they had so strangely left. "The earth is not overbalanced. She still
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: rolls on her proper course, I have no doubt. The breaking away of this
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: island is not a serious matter to the earth as a whole. The contour
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of the hemispheres is not changed. I showed you how I had traced the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: outlines of the continent before, even, that I was confident we had
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: been blown off the earth.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "No. Those who explore the region which we have left will find hills
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and valleys as before--awful crevasses, perhaps, and steaming cauldrons
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of water and mud. No vegetation, of course, but snow has perhaps fallen
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: on some parts of the raw scar, and those explorers may be able to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: travel through a region that was--a week ago--the bowels of the earth!
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "The foundation rocks of the earth are left raw and exposed, as they
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: may be after some terrific land-slip. But nothing more. We sail here
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: high above the earth----"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But if we have been observed from the earth--and of course those
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: anything else, isn't going to help us much while we're here. What I
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: opened fire.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Four shots he placed in quick succession. Two of the wolves rolled
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: over and over upon the ice, and a third limped off after the remainder,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: who darted behind the ice-block again. Mark leaped up, uttering a shout
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of triumph, and followed them, believing that he had beaten the pack
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: thus easily.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But the moment he came around the obstruction he found himself in the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: midst of the actual pack. He was not charged by a dozen of the fierce
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: creatures, but by more than half a hundred.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The wolves had raided the cache already, having torn away the blocks
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of ice, and were feasting on the half-frozen bear meat. Mark did not
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: think at that moment of driving them away, however; he wanted to get
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: away himself.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: His shots had aroused the camp, although he was some distance from it.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But when his friends ran out upon the ice they did not see him, and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: nobody for the minute suspected what had happened or where the youth
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had gone. The two bodies of the wolves were not at first sighted.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mark did not have a chance to use his rifle again. The wolves seemed
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to rush him from all sides, and a huge gray fellow leaped against him,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: knocking the rifle from the lad's grasp and rolling him over and over,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: half stunned, upon the ice.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: By marvelous good fortune none of the savage beasts followed him for
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the moment. The wounded wolf took up their attention. They pitched
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: upon him and before Mark could rise to his feet the savage brutes had
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: torn their wounded comrade limb from limb.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The ice was stained crimson and their slobbering jaws ran blood. A
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: more terrifying sight the youth had seldom seen. He could not reach
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his rifle, and the bulk of the pack was between him and the way he had
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: come. He therefore leaped away in the other direction, running from
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: instead of toward his friends.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He passed through the thinning pack without being touched, although
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: several of the beasts snapped at him and the clashing of their fangs
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sent cold chills up and down his spine. Then he leaped away at top
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: speed across the ice.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: It was a natural move, but a very unwise one. The wolves tore their
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: comrade to pieces and bolted the pieces in about sixty seconds. Then
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they wheeled en masse and shot off across the glacier after the boy.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mark ran about as fast as he had ever run before. Fortunately he had
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: spurs in his boot-soles and therefore he did not slip on the ice. But
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: suddenly he found that he was crossing a smooth sheet of new ice--the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: surface of a lake in the glacier. This lake had frozen after the sun
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: went down and Mark felt the new ice bend under him as he ran.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The moonlight revealed his path before him plainly; but the now yapping
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pack behind took up so much of his attention that Mark did not take
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a careful view of the surface of the thinly frozen lake.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The leaders were all but upon him in a very few moments. As the first
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: wolf leaped, Mark threw himself sideways and ran off at a tangent,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: holding his feet much better than did the brutes. They went scratching
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: along the smooth ice for some yards before they could change their
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: course.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The turn, however, put Mark in a serious position. He found the thin
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ice cracking loudly under his feet. He glanced ahead. There was a
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: streak of open water.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: He tried to turn again, but this time his spurs slipped. He went down
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: on the ice. The first two wolves were a-top of him and one seized his
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: arm. But luckily it was protected by his thick coat sleeve.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Then the wolves darted back from the prone, sliding body of the boy.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They saw their peril; Mark could not help himself.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: With a shriek and splash he was struggling in the deadly cold water
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of the lake. He plunged beneath the black surface while the yapping
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pack halted upon the very verge of the broken ice.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
