text: CHAPTER XXII
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: THE WOLF TRAIL
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The hole into which Mark fell was not many yards across; but when he
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: came to the surface of the icy water he found that the edge of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: strong ice was fringed with open jaws and lolling, blood-red tongues.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The wolves had surrounded the open bit of water and were prepared to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: welcome him with wide jaws wherever he sought to climb out.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The lad knew well enough that he was helpless against these foes. To
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: seek to reach the ice would be to give himself up to the savage brutes.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Nor could he remain long afloat in this ice-cold water. He was already
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: chilled to his very marrow.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mark was in a perilous position indeed. He could bear up but a few
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: moments. He knew that if he again sank beneath the surface he would
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: never rise again.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: And so he struggled mightily to keep his head above water. The wolves
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: did not dare leap in to seize him; they did not have to. In their
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: canine minds they probably knew that the boy would have to come to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: them. But fortunately for Mark the wolves had given tongue when they
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: chased him over the ice. Otherwise the boy's friends might not have
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: been warned of his predicament until too late to be of assistance to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: him.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But the moment the wolves gave tongue Andy Sudds had started with a
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: whoop for the cache of bear meat. Jack and Phineas Roebach followed
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: with their weapons.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Coming in sight of the slavering pack, as they whined about the open
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: water-hole in the lake, Andy advised his companions as to the situation
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and they deployed so as to shoot into the pack of wolves without sending
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: their bullets in the direction of the half-drowned Mark.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: All using magazine rifles, they were enabled to send such a fusillade
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: into the wolves that the pack was scattered in a few moments. Then
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they ran on to the edge of the broken ice, finding at least a dozen
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dead brutes lying about the water-hole.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack lay down and reached his gun barrel out to his chum and by its
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: aid Mark got to the edge of the ice and scrambled out of the water.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They ran him back to the campfire in short order and then Andy set out
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to make a second attack upon the wolves, the pack having returned to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: eat up their comrades.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: However, the beasts had already been punished enough. They could not
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: stand before the old hunter, and ran howling down the glacier.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "One thing about it," Andy Sudds said, "we can make up our minds there
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: is an outlet from this field of ice in that direction. To escape we
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: have only to follow the wolf trail."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They were not in shape to travel at once, however. Jack's hand pained
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: him frightfully after his work in helping Mark escape from the water,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and Mark, himself had a serious chill before sunrise. Treated by the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: professor, however, the youth quickly recovered from his plunge into
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the lake.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But it was decided, nevertheless, to wait over another of the short,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: torrid days before leaving the trees, for the traveling by night would
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: be much more practicable. So they were leisurely eating another meal
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of bear steak when the sun touched the horizon with rosy light.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The dawn broke in what Jack termed "record time," and Washington White
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: gave vent to his surprise in characteristic language:
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I done seed de sun rise in eb'ry clime, f'om de Arctic t'rough de
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: tropical to the Antarctic kentries. But de speed wid w'ich disher sun
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pops up is enough ter tear de bastin 't'reads loose from de Universe--it
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: suah is! I finds mahself," continued Wash, reflectively,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "circumnavigatin' ma mind to de eend dat disher 'sperience we is all
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: goin' t'rough is a hallucination ob de brain. In odder words, we is
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: all climbin' trees an' makin' a noise like de nuts wot grows dere. Do
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: you hear me?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We hear you," said Jack. "And if you think you're crazy, all right.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: I don't feel like joining you in the foolish factory yet awhile."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I more than half believe the darkey's right," muttered Phineas Roebach.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "This experience is enough to turn the brain of any man. I don't myself
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: believe half the things we are seeing."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The heat of the sun, as soon as it had well risen, was a fact that
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: could scarcely be doubted, however. They were glad to seek the shade
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of the fir trees, and the surface of the glacier began to melt with
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a rapidity that not only surprised, but startled them.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: A flood of water, like a great river, began to sweep by the narrow bit
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of earth on which they were encamped. The roar of the falling water
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: into the crevasse from which they had so fortunately escaped soon
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: became deafening.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They all had to remove their outer garments. The smell of the heated
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: fir branches was like the odor of a forest on a hot August afternoon.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Professor Henderson watched the melting of the ice with a serious face.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: When Mark asked him what he thought threatened their safety, the old
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: scientist replied:
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I _am_ serious, that is true, my boy. I see in this terrible heat the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: threat of a great and sudden change in this glacier. We must start as
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: soon as the freeze comes on to-night, and travel as fast as we can
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: toward the far end. Mr. Roebach knows the trail, I believe?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I've been over it several times; but I must say that the glacier has
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sunk a whole lot since I was across it before," the oil man declared.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We can follow the wolves," said Andy Sudds, stoutly. "They knew their
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: way out."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "That is true, we will hope," Professor Henderson said. "For I must
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: state that I believe our peril is very great."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "How so, sir?" Jack queried.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We do not know how soon this glacier may move on."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Another earthquake?" cried Mark.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Oh, gollyation! I suttenly hopes not," wailed Wash.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "No. I do not think we need apprehend any further seismic disturbance.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Such gaseous trouble as there is in the heart of this island will find
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: escape--if I do not mistake--through Mr. Roebach's oil well."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Then what is troubling you, sir?" queried the boys in chorus.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "The knowledge I possess of the nature of glaciers leads me to fear
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: this peril," replied the aged scientist. "Under the immediate conditions
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: this vast river of ice may move forward at any moment."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Impossible, I tell you!" interrupted Phineas Roebach. "I tell you
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: this is a 'dead' glacier. It has not been in motion for ages. I have
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: seen the face of it at the lower end of this valley. There is only a
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: small stream of water trickling from under it, and the forest has grown
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: right up to the base of the ice wall."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And how big a stream do you suppose is flowing from beneath the glacier
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: now, and working its way toward what was once the Arctic Ocean--or
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Beaufort Sea?" queried the professor.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Why--why---"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Exactly," concluded Mr. Henderson, sharply. "You had not thought of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: that. You see this vast amount of water pouring into yonder crevasse?
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Water cannot run up hill. It is bound to seek a lower level. It must
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: force its way down the valley, beneath the glacier, and so stream out
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: from beneath the ice at the far end.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Gradually this flow of water is going to wear away the ice--is going
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to loosen the entire glacier. And then, suddenly, with no warning at
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: all, the field will plunge forward--break up, sink, grind itself to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: powder against these cliffs! And where will we be?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "My goodness gracious gollyation!" cried Washington White. "I wants
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to git out o' disher right away--me an' Buttsy is ready ter go ter
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: onct, an' no mistake!"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What will you do--swim?" queried Jack, pointing to the river that was
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: now washing the shore of the strip of soil on which they stood--a river
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: which seemed to stretch the entire breadth of the glacier.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Jack and Mark were deeply impressed by the good sense of the professor's
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: observations; and both Andy and Roebach were disturbed. They watched
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the disintegration of the ice with considerable worriment. It seemed
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to melt away much quicker during these hours of sunshine than it had
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: on the previous occasion when the orb of day shone fully upon the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: surface of the island in the air.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The soil they had camped upon began to crumble away, too, for the heat
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was insidiously melting the ice under the morainial deposit. At the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: time which should be high noon--when the sun was directly overhead in
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: its course--one end of the patch of soil, forest and all, slumped into
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the water with a loud crash, and at once the fierce current tore the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: rubbish apart and carried it onward to the brink of the crevasse, into
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the maw of which it fell.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Wash is perfectly right in his statement," Jack Darrow said. "This
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: is no place for any of us. As soon as the ice freezes up after the sun
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sets we must travel as fast as we can after the wolves."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And I wish we could travel as fast as they can," muttered Andy Sudds.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I wish we had Mr. Roebach's dogs and sleds," said Mark.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "All right. As long as you're wishing, though, why not wish for the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: right thing?" demanded Jack.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And what is that, Master Jack?" asked the oil man.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Wish we were aboard the _Snowbird_ and that she was all right. That's
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: what _I_ wish."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And I reckon the boy's right," said Phineas Roebach, with a sigh. "As
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: much as I object to flying through the air, an airship now would be
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a God-send indeed."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: What bear meat the wolves had not destroyed the water now washed away.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The party had only that which Andy had smoked over the fire. But this
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was easily carried and their packs were not heavy when they prepared
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to leave the camp as soon after sunset as the frost would allow.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The terrific change from the heat of midsummer to the cold of midwinter,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and all within something near twenty-four hours, was hard indeed to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: bear. The professor calculated that the drop in temperature from high
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: noon was, two hours after sunset, exactly seventy degrees Fahrenheit.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Human life will become extinct upon this fragmentary planet, if nothing
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: further happens to it, in a very few years," he said, thoughtfully.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We are not attuned to such frightful changes."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They had eaten, and had packed their supplies. The earth had long since
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: appeared again and the radiance she reflected fell softly upon the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ice-field. It glistened like silver, stretching, miles and miles away
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: before them when they climbed down from the fringe of trees in which
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they had encamped, and set out down the glacier.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They traveled carefully at first, for there were sinks in the ice which
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had barely skimmed over since sun-down. The thermometer registered 18
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: above zero, however, and the biting cold was congealing all lakes and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pools very rapidly. Where they tramped through the slush their
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: footprints froze behind them. In an hour the mercury had fallen ten
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: degrees more and they were beating their gloved hands across their
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: breasts to keep up the circulation.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: They tramped on at good speed for several hours. Here and there along
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: either edge of the glacier, were groves of fir trees like the one they
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had encamped in. But in places the ice had melted from under and around
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: these patches of rock and soil and the roots of the trees were exposed,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: while the earth had slumped away in small land-slips until nothing but
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a heap of debris was left.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and resting. While they were warming themselves over the fire the old
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: hunter built, and Wash was boiling some coffee, Jack suddenly beheld
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: several shining points of light in the little wood on the edge of which
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they had halted.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Look out! We're being watched," he whispered in Andy's ear.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The hunter grabbed his rifle and looked where Jack pointed. At once
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: he seemed relieved.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "The wolves," he said. "They know their way out of this valley. I don't
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: want to travel on this ice any longer than I can help."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: hunter made a determined charge into the brush at the lurking wolves.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The pack scattered at first, but finding themselves determinedly
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: gathered once more and trailed away up a narrow path upon the rocky
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: wall close at hand.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: trail.

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: ocean once rolled? Dat de hugeous salt sea broke its breakers on dem
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ice-bound shores? Git erlong, chile! Yo' is tryin' ter bamboozle me,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: suah."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "That is where the Arctic Ocean rolled, all right," growled Phineas
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Roebach. "I can swear to that. I have been here before. Something has
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: certainly happened to it."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I declare!" chuckled Jack Darrow, who could not miss the joke, despite
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the seriousness of their situation. "Somebody has removed the ocean
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: without permission." Behind a great fortress of rock which had once
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: been an island they saw the same column of smoke. But it was something
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: nearer to them on the bed of the Arctic sea that more particularly
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: attracted their attention.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Look at that thing! That monster!" cried Mark, pointing.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And there is another!" shouted Jack.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Whales!" yelled the excited Andy Sudds. "Those are whales as sure as
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: shooting--there's a school of them here."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: And they had no more than made this discovery when a party of men, all
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dressed in furs and some dragging great sleds behind them, came out
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: from behind the pile of rocks which had certainly once been an island
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in the ocean.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: These new-comers did not see our heroes and their friends, but they
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: approached the whale stranded nearest to the rocks. This huge leviathan,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: like all the others of the herd, was long since dead. The men attacked
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: him with blubber-saws and axes and began to cut him up in a most
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: workmanlike manner.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "A whaling ship, sure enough," declared Professor Henderson, who seemed
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the least astonished by these manoeuvres. "We will be among friends
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: soon. And we will hope that the ship--despite the fact that her crew
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: has come whaling ashore,--will have her keel in deep water." The party
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ran their sleds ashore on the right bank of the river at its old mouth.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Then they started at a round pace for the spot in the old bed of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ocean where the crew of the whaler were cutting up their prize.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ON THE WHALING BARK
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: It was several miles from the brink of what had once been the polar
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sea to the spot where the whalers were at work. Jack Darrow, Mark
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Sampson, and their friends found it a difficult way to travel too.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Naturally they had abandoned the sleds. The ice on the stream which
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: flowed out of this mouth of the Coleville River was so broken that
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they could no longer use it as a highway. The bottom of what had once
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: been the ocean was only partly ice-covered. There were enormous rocks
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to climb over, or to find a path around. Reefs and ledges reared their
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: heads fifty feet and more high. There were sinks, too, in the floor
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of the old ocean; but these were mostly covered with ice.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The Arctic Ocean must have receded at the time of the upheaval which
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had flung this island into the air so rapidly that many of the sea's
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: denizens, beside the school of whales, could not escape.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Here, in one big pool, lay frozen in the ice a monster white shark.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: It had battered itself to death against the rocks in trying to escape.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Through yonder blow-hole in another pool there suddenly appeared an
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: enormous bewhiskered head, with great tusks like the drooping mustache
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of a soldier.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "A walrus!" exclaimed Jack, recognizing the creature.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And yonder are seals playing in the open pool," said Mark.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "These pools, or lakes, are still of salt water," said the professor,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: thoughtfully. "Ah! what would I not have given to have been on that
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: headland yonder at the moment the ocean went out."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Not me! Not me!" cried Phineas Roebach. "I'd gone completely off my
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: head then, for fair--I know I would!"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Mr. Roebach is not quite sure now that he isn't suffering from some
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: form of insanity," said Jack, chuckling.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Den it suah is too bad dat we nebber kin fin' dat chrisomela
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: bypunktater plant ter cure him wid," declared Washington White,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dolefully.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But, by the piper that played before Pharaoh!" ejaculated Phineas
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Roebach, at last brought to a point where he _had_ to admit that
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: no reasonable explanation would fit the conditions confronting them,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "tell me this: What has become of the Arctic Ocean?" "You can search
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: me!" drawled Jack. "I can assure you, Mr. Roebach, that I haven't seen
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: it. Have you got it, Mark?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "The question of what has become of this great sea which once washed
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the shore we are now leaving," said Professor Henderson, seriously,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "is a remarkably interesting one. The ocean may have merely receded
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: for a few miles at the time of the volcanic eruption and earthquake
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: which threw off this new planet."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Phineas Roebach shook his head at this, but said nothing.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It may be," pursued Mr. Henderson, "that that part of our old world
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: that was shot into space did not include much of this Arctic sea. We
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: may find beyond here," pointing, as he spoke, ahead, "instead of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: receded ocean, no ocean at all. We cannot believe that this island in
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the air is spherical like our own old earth. It is a ragged form which
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: will show on what we may call the _under_ side the very convolutions and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: scars made by its breaking away from the old earth. Do you get my
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: meaning?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Yo' suttenly is a most liquid speaker, Perfesser," declared Washington
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: White. "Yo' was sayin' dat w'en disher new planet broke off de earf,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: she slopped over de whole Arctic Ocean."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Perhaps that puts it quite as simply," said Professor Henderson,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: smiling grimly. "The ocean 'slopped over'. It was either left behind
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to partly fill the cavity left by the departure of this torn-away world
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: we are living on, or it has receded into the valleys and sinks upon
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the other side of this small planet."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Phineas Roebach threw up both hands and groaned.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It's as clear as mud!" he cried. "I don't understand a thing about
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: it."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But the old professor went on without heeding him, knowing that his
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pupils, Jack and Mark, were deeply interested in the mystery of this
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: torn-away world, or island in the air.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It is a moot question whether or not the weight of the water which
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: lay in this vast sink, before the eruption, was not needed, and is not
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: needed right now, for the balancing of this tiny planet we are living
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: on. Nature adjusts herself to every change more quickly than human
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: intelligence. How much of the crust of the earth, extending up into
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the polar regions, was broken away from our old world, we do not know.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But that it is now perfectly balanced we can have no doubt--that balance
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: is proved by the fact of the regularity of the recurrence of night and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: day."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: These and many other observations Professor Henderson spoke as the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: party continued its rugged advance over the more or less dry bottom
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of the ocean. In two hours the party was observed by the crew of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: whaler at work on the carcass of the great whale. The sailors signaled
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to them, and when the boys and their friends drew near, some of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: whalemen ran forward to welcome them.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "More refugees from inland, eh?" exclaimed a rough but cordial seaman,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: who proved to be the captain's harpooner and boat-steerer. "We have
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: some traders from Aleukan already with us."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Ah!" said Professor Henderson, "we have been looking for them. They
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: have arrived in safety, then?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But nearly frozen," said the boat-steerer.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And where are the people of Nigatuk?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We believe all those not killed or burned in the first earthquake
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: were taken off by the United States revenue cutter _Bear_. She sailed
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: for Bering Sea some time before the final earthquake."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "And where is the ocean?" demanded Phineas Roebach.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It was sucked away in a great tidal wave and left the _Orion_ high and
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: dry yonder," said the sailor.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: It was evident that the sailors had no appreciation of the real
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: happening. They did not know that they were cut off from the old earth
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: by thousands of miles of space. "Your bark's name is _Orion_, then?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: queried the professor.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Bedford; the only whaler under sail in these seas, I reckon. Most o'
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: them that's after the ile is steam kettles," he added, thus
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: disrespectfully referring to the fleet of steam whalers from San

text: surprising parabola through the air.

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in, was crushed to fragments as the huge head and shoulders of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: with a hand upon the small of his back. "Yo' come near ter spilein'
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: perfesser c'd git erlong widout me?"

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: In hunting adventures, and in the labor of trying-out the whale blubber,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: several weeks passed. The marooned scientist and his friends, with the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: crew of the whale ship, experienced some bad weather during this time.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: For three entire days a terrible snowstorm raged--a blizzard that
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: drifted the snow about the _Orion_ (which had chanced, when she was
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: stranded, to settle on a perfectly even keel) until one could walk
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: over her rail out upon the bottom of the sea.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: as ever. The snow melted very rapidly and the old sea bed was soon
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: awash. The beasts and fish still alive in the sinks were enabled to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: reach the streams running out of the various mouths of the Coleville,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and these creatures took to deep water.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: we'd sail the old _Orion_ after them, and reach the open sea again."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his crew believed it, too. But Professor Henderson and the boys
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: seriously discussed making some move from this locality.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: It was plain that there was still plenty of game 'along the shore of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the old ocean, and they had about made up their mind to follow the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: edge of the shore toward Bering Sea and if possible find the revenue
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: cutter _Bear_, when another storm broke over them. No snow fell
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: this time. There was almost continual thunder and a downpour of rain
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and hail that was sufficient to smother anybody that ventured out upon
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the deck of the _Orion_. The new planet seemed to be in the throes
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of another eruption, too.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Lightning lit the waste about them with intermittent flashes. They had
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: lost sight entirely of the old earth, of the moon, and of the sun. It
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: seemed to Jack and Mark as though this tiny island in the air must be
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: flying through space again, buffeted by every element.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The wind wailed and screamed about the whaleship. There were more than
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sixty souls aboard and they crouched in the cabin and in the forecastle
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and knew not what to make of such a foray of the elements. At one
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: moment the rain flooded down upon the decks as though a cloud had burst
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: directly above them; then great hailstones fell, drumming on the planks
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: like musket balls.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The calmest person among them all was Professor Henderson. Captain
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Sproul had given the aged scientist the use of the small chart-room.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: There he had set up certain of his instruments, and he hovered over
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: these most of his waking hours, making innumerable calculations from
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: time to time. During the awful turmoil of the elements he watched his
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: instruments without sleep. The boys remained with him most of the time,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: for they realized that some catastrophe was threatening which the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: scientist feared but did not wish to explain at once.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Suddenly Captain Sproul burst into the chart-room and gasped:
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Can you tell me the meaning of this, Mr. Henderson? You're a scientific
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sharp and know a whole lot of things. My cook just went to the galley
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: door to throw out a pot of slops and something--some mysterious
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: force--snatched the heavy iron pot out of his hand and it went sailing
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: off over the ship's rail. Can you explain that?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: professor was ready to answer.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Don't seem to be no wind blowing just at present," said Captain Sproul.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Wait!" commanded the professor. "Order every companionway and hatch
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: closed. Do not allow a man to go on deck, nor to open a deadlight. We
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: must exist upon the air that remains in the vessel for the present."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What do you mean?" gasped the skipper.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "There is no air outside!" declared Professor Henderson, solemnly. "We
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: are flying through space where no atmosphere exists. The iron pot
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: merely remained poised in space--our planet, far, far, heavier, is
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: falling through this awful void."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: positively white beneath his tan.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to the indicator of one of the delicate instruments before him on the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: chart table. "The balance of attraction between the earth and the sun
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: has become disturbed and we are plunging--"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Henderson. "Her attraction has proved the greater. We are falling with
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

text: space so many weeks ago."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: but I don't understand a thunderin' word you say."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Professor Henderson.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The boys had already felt that it was more difficult to breathe. They
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: heard cries all over the ship. Washington White burst into the room,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: crying: "Oh, lawsy-massy me, Perfesser! We is done bein' smothercated.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: De breaf am a-leabin' our bodies fo' suah."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: descended toward its parent planet.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: wind-lashed ocean, and a hurricane, the like of which the two boys
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had never experienced before, was at its height.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: senses all alert. He shouted:

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
