text: "And is it not the Arctic Ocean?"
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Later I will tell you. They say there is no land in sight. I believe
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the bulk of the land which was shot off by the volcanic eruption has
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: now sunk in this sea. What sea it is we can tell soon."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "When can we see the sun and take an observation?" queried Mark.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Perhaps finding the temperature of this ocean which surrounds us will
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: tell us something. However, we must have patience until this bitter
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: storm is past."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: And this did call for patience, for the hurricane continued for fully
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a week. Meanwhile the Orion ran on under almost bare poles, and in a
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: northwesterly direction. This course, Captain Sproul believed, would
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: bring them to Bering Sea, and their homeward route.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But a vast and amazing discovery awaited the hardy navigator of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: whaling bark when the wind finally died down, the clouds were swept
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: away, and the sun again appeared. Professor Henderson appeared on deck,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: too, and calculated their position side by side with Captain Sproul.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The latter's amazement was unbounded. His calculations, no matter how
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: he worked them, made the position of the _Orion_ 148 degrees west of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Greenwich and 49 degrees north.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: In other words, he was far, far south of the Alaskan Peninsula. During
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: this awful storm he had traversed (or so he was bound to believe) a
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: long stretch of the Arctic Ocean, Bering Sea and Strait, had passed
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the Aleutian Islands, and was now more than a thousand miles south of
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the position of the _Orion_ when she first became stranded.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The professor endeavored to explain to him again what had really
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: happened--that the fragment of the earth on which they had been marooned
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had plunged into the old earth again, landing by great good fortune
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in the empty sea between North America and Asia--in the North Pacific.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Such an explanation seemed utterly ridiculous to Captain Sproul, to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his seamen, and even to Phineas Roebach. They were convinced that
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Professor Henderson was in his dotage. They would rather believe that
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the _Orion_, sailing on pretty nearly a straight course according
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to the compass, had traversed this enormous distance during the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: hurricane.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The professor and his young friends, however, had studied too deeply
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the mystery of this astounding affair to be mistaken. All the phenomena
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of the experience had been noted by Professor Henderson. He had the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: material of a most remarkable work in his notebooks, and that volume
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: will soon appear to delight the scientific world.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Meanwhile the _Orion_ changed her course and ran for San Francisco
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to re-provision. She had a very valuable cargo of oil which she would
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: later take around the Horn to her home port, New Bedford.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: At San Francisco, however, Professor Henderson, Jack and Mark, with
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Andy and Wash and Phineas Roebach, left the ship. Roebach was to report
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to his oil company and probably return to Alaska to continue his search
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: for petroleum. Our friends started overland for home, stopping off at
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the city where Dr. Artemus Todd resided to explain to that savant the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: reason for their inability to secure a single specimen of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: _Chrysothele-Byzantium_, which herb the doctor was so confident
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: would be of incalculable value in treating patients suffering from
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: aphasia, amnesia, and kindred troubles.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Perhaps the disappointed doctor was not entirely sure that his friend,
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Professor Henderson, and his comrades, had gone through the strange
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: experience which they recounted. But a few weeks later several vessels
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: reported sighting a new island in the North Pacific, south of the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Alaskan Peninsula. On this island men who landed discovered a colony
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: of Kodiak bears, some Arctic foxes, and the remains of vegetation which
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had never before been found south of the Arctic Circle.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: This discovery created vast talk among the geographers and scientists.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: An exploring party was sent out by the Smithsonian Institution to
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: examine the new island. It was pronounced of volcanic origin, yet the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: formation of it was not of recent time. There was on this island (which
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: contained several square miles) the remains of a glacier, and in the
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: ice the party discovered the wreck of a wonderful flying machine, which
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had evidently been built within a few months.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Of course, this was the _Snowbird_, the aeroplane which our friends
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had been obliged to abandon. But by that time Jack and Mark had built
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: another flying machine on the same lines as the one which they had
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: lost in the crevasse of the glacier.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The professor proceeded to explain and prove all this in his book; but
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: there will always be certain doubters. Washington White, however, was
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: more disturbed than any of the party over the fact that everybody would
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: not accept as true the scientist's account of their wonderful voyage
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: on a torn-away world.
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "De stupendous and unprecedented gall some folks has is suttenly beyond
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: comparination!" exploded Wash. "Dere is folks dat ain't nebber been
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to Bawston, eben, dat dares say dat we didn't go ter Alaska in a flyin'
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: masheen, an' den fly away wid a piece ob dat kentry inter de
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: cimcum-ambient air--droppin' back on de same w'en we'd got t'roo wid
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: it, an' landin' right outside de harbor of San Francisco. Dey won't
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: belieb it at all, not eben w'en I proves it to 'em."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Abraham Lincoln Ulysses Grant Garibaldi Thomas Edison Guglielmo Marconi

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Butts."

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the chums, in chorus.

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in all ma trabels; didn't I?"

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the bungalow."
title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: On a Torn-Away World; Or, the Captives of the Great Earthquake
author: Rockwood, Roy
